Goblin UI

Widgets

CGOBButtonThe Button is probably one of the widely used widget in Goblin.
CGOBButtonMasked
CGOBCheckBoxCheckBox is similar to button.
CGOBComboBoxComboBox can contain children buttons.
CGOBEditBoxEditBox has a rectangle background which is can be transparent.
CGOBHScrollBar
CGOBRadioButtonRadioButton is similar to button but a bit more complex.
CGOBSliderSlider is a flexible widget handling both vertical or horizontal or both at the same time.
CGOBStaticPicStaticPic is a simple widget similar to CGOBStaticText but handles an image instead of text.
CGOBStaticTextStatic text widget is useful for adding a widget that only displays a text string.
CGOBSysClose
CGOBSysMinimize
CGOBToolTipTooltip is a widget that simply draws a rectangle box and associated text.
CGOBVScrollBar
CGOBWidgetWidget is the base class of all widgets derived from CGOBWidgetBase.
